title: Help, only three letters (IGS) to identify font
content:
Hi I am having trouble trying to identify this font.  
There are only three letters to look at and I think they may have stretched the s?  
Any Ideas would be appreciated.

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=font_8.jpg) | 97.13 KB |
author: isaac_nana

comments.content:
Clarendon Light will get you pretty darn close:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/clarendon-sb/light/testdrive.html?s=IGS&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128115111/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/clarendon-sb/light/testdrive.html?s=IGS&p=48)
